meanings.definition: A powerful tractor with a broad upright blade at the front for clearing ground.
meanings.sent1: The bulldozers cleared the construction site efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The bulldozers were used to flatten the land before building the new road.
meanings.sent3: The bulldozers seemed to dance as they pushed the dirt aside.
meanings.sent4: The bulldozers were like giants, effortlessly moving earth in their path.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bulldozers echoed through the valley as they worked.

meanings.definition: To clear, level, or move with a bulldozer.
meanings.sent1: The construction crew bulldozers the area to make way for the new building.
meanings.sent2: They bulldozers the debris out of the way after the storm.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bulldozers my way through the crowd to catch the bus.
meanings.sent4: She bulldozers through her homework quickly to have time for play.
meanings.sent5: The team bulldozers through the competition to reach the finals.
